Paul Luex

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Theodore and Kathryn Evers
  3. Location of Family: St. Libory, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Grand Island, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 7/30/1916, Manhattan, NY
  8. Date of Death: 4/15/1989
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Grand Island Independent (misdated); Funeral program; Social Security Death Index.
